GV03sb_07_u:950: viśvadarśato hyeṣo 'gniṃ sumnāya dadhire puro janā iti yajño vai sumnaṃ yajñāya vā

GV03sb_07_u:959: tadāhuḥ / yadretaḥ sikatā ucyante kimāsāṃ reto rūpamiti śuklā iti brūyācuklaṃ hi reto

GV03sb_07_u:987: tadasminnetatpratidadhāti tā asaṃkhyātā aparimitā nivapati ko hi tadveda
GV03sb_07_u:988: yāvattadbrahmaṇa utsannaṃ sa ha vā etaṃ sarvaṃ kṛtsnam prajāpatiṃ saṃskaroti ya
GV03sb_07_u:991: tadāhuḥ / kaitāsāmasaṃkhyātānāṃ saṃkhyeti dve iti brūyāddve hi sikate śuklā ca kṛṣṇā
GV03sb_07_u:992: cātho sapta viṃśatiśatānīti brūyādetāvanti hi saṃvatsarasyāhorātrāṇyatho dve
GV03sb_07_u:993: dvāpañcāśe śate ityetāvanti hyetasya ṣaḍṛcasyākṣarāṇyatho pañcaviṃśatiriti
GV03sb_07_u:998: yajuṣmatya iṣṭakā upadhīyante na pakṣapuceṣu na sādayati nedretaḥ prajātiṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1003: tasmādyonau retaḥ siktamāpyāyate saumībhyām prāṇo vai somaḥ prāṇaṃ tadretasi
GV03sb_07_u:1004: dadhāti tasmādretaḥ siktam prāṇamabhisambhavati pūyeddha yadṛte
GV03sb_07_u:1005: prāṇātsambhavedeṣo haivātra sūdadohāḥ prāṇo vai somaḥ sūdadohāḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1008: viśvataḥ soma vṛṣṇyamiti reto vai vṛṣṇyamāpyāyasva sametu te
GV03sb_07_u:1009: sarvataḥ soma reta ityetadbhavā vājasya saṃgatha ityanne vai vājo bhavānnasya
GV03sb_07_u:1010: saṃgatha ityetatsaṃ te payāṃsi samu yanti vājā iti raso vai payo 'nne vājāḥ saṃ te rasāḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1011: samu yantvannānītyetatsaṃ vṛṣṇyabhimātiṣāha iti saṃ retāṃsi pāpmasaha
GV03sb_07_u:1012: ityetadāpyāyamāno amṛtāya someti prajātyāṃ tadamṛtaṃ dadhāti tasmātprajātiramṛtā
GV03sb_07_u:1013: divi śravāṃsyuttamāni dhiṣveti candramā vā asya divi śrava uttamaṃ sa
GV03sb_07_u:1014: hyenamamuṣmiṃloke śrāvayati dvābhyāmāpyāyayati gāyatryā ca triṣṭubhā ca
GV03sb_07_u:1019: dvābhyāmāpyāyayati taddvādaśa dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaro
GV03sb_07_u:1024: pravargyopasadbhyām pracarati pravargyopasadbhyām pracaryāthaitāṃ carmaṇi citiṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1025: samavaśamayanti tadyaccarmaṇi carma vai rūpaṃ rūpāṇāmupāptyai lomato loma vai
GV03sb_07_u:1026: rūpaṃ rūpāṇāmupāptyai rohite rohite ha sarvāṇi rūpāṇi sarveṣāṃ rūpāṇāmupāptyā
GV03sb_07_u:1032: karotyājyena taddhi śuddham medhyamatho anabhyārohāya na hi kiṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1033: canānyaddhavirājyena prokṣanti tūṣṇīmaniruktaṃ vai tadyattūṣṇīṃ sarvaṃ vā
GV03sb_07_u:1034: aniruktaṃ sarveṇaivaitacuddham medhyaṃ karotyatho anabhyārohāya na hi kiṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1039: yadabhighāritaṃ tajjuṣṭaṃ tanmedhyamājyenājyena hi havirabhighārayanti tūṣṇīṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1040: tūṣṇīṃ hi havirabhighārayanti darbhaiste hi śuddhā medhyā agrairagraṃ hi devānām
GV03sb_07_u:1042: tadāhuḥ / yatprathamāmeva citim prokṣati kathamasyaiṣa sarvo 'gniḥ prokṣito
GV03sb_07_u:1043: bhavati kathaṃ carmaṇi praṇītaḥ kathamaśvapraṇīta iti yadevātra sarvāsāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1044: citīnāmiṣṭakāḥ prokṣatyevamu hāsyaiṣa sarvo 'gniḥ prokṣito bhavatyevaṃ carmaṇi
GV03sb_07_u:1049: yajñaṃ taṃsyamānānrakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā ajighāṃsanna yakṣyadhve na yajñaṃ taṃsyadhva
GV03sb_07_u:1050: iti tebhya etānagnīnetā iṣṭakā vajrānkṣurapavīnkṛtvā prāharaṃstairenānastṛṇvata
GV03sb_07_u:1054: yaddevā akurvannidaṃ nu tāni rakṣāṃsi devairevopahatāni
GV03sb_07_u:1055: yattvetatkaroti yaddevā akurvaṃstatkaravāṇītyatho yadeva rakṣo yaḥ pāpmā tebhya
GV03sb_07_u:1064: purīṣyāso agnayaḥ prāvaṇabhiḥ sajoṣasa iti prāyaṇarūpaṃ na
GV03sb_07_u:1065: tathā kuryādāgneyīreva gāyatrīḥ kāmavatīranubrūyādā te vatso mano yamattubhyaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1071: tisrasrivṛdagniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā tāvataivainametadreto bhūtaṃ siñcati tāḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1072: sapta sampadyante saha triranūktābhyāṃ saptacitiko 'gniḥ sapta 'rtavaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1073: saṃvatsaro 'gniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā tāvattadbhavatyupāṃśvanvāha reto vā atra
GV03sb_07_u:1074: yajña upāṃśu vai retaḥ sicyate paścādanubruvannanveti candobhirevaitadyajñam
GV03sb_07_u:1078: etadvai devā abibhayuryadvai na iha rakṣāṃsi
GV03sb_07_u:1079: nāṣṭrā na hanyuriti ta etaṃ vajramapaśyannamumevādityamasau vā āditya eṣo
GV03sb_07_u:1080: 'śvasta etena vajreṇa purastādrakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā apahatyābhaye 'nāṣṭre svasti
GV03sb_07_u:1081: samāśnuvata tathaivaitadyajamāna etena vajreṇa purastādrakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā
GV03sb_07_u:1082: apahatyābhaye 'nāṣṭre svasti samaśnuta āgaghantyagniṃ dakṣiṇataḥ pucasya
GV03sb_07_u:1086: antareṇa pariśritaḥ prāñcaṃ nayanti tatprācyai diśaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1087: pāpmānamapahanti taṃ dakṣiṇā taddakṣiṇāyai diśaḥ pāpmānamapahanti tam
GV03sb_07_u:1088: pratyañcaṃ tatpratīcyai diśaḥ pāpmānamapahanti tamudañcaṃ tadudīcyai diśaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1093: etāṃ citimavaghrāpayatyasau vā āditya eṣo 'śva imā u
GV03sb_07_u:1094: sarvāḥ prajā yā imā iṣṭakāstadyadavaghrādayatyasāveva tadāditya imāḥ prajā
GV03sb_07_u:1095: abhijighrati tasmādu haitatsarvo 'smīti manyate prajāpatervīryeṇa tadyatpratyañcaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1096: yantamavaghrāpayati pratyaṅ hyevaiṣa yannimāḥ sarvāḥ prajā abhijighrati
GV03sb_07_u:1099: asau vā āditya eṣo 'śva ima u lokā etāḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1105: prajāpatimabruvaṃstvamimamanvica sa tubhyaṃ svāya pitra āvirbhaviṣyatīti
GV03sb_07_u:1106: tamaśvaḥ śuklo bhūtvānvaicattamadbhya upodāsṛptam puṣkaraparṇe viveda
GV03sb_07_u:1107: tamabhyavekṣāṃ cakre sa hainamuduvoṣa tasmāduvoṣa tasmādaśvaḥ śukla
GV03sb_07_u:1108: uduṣṭamukha ivāthā ha durakṣo bhāvukastamu vā ṛtveva hiṃsitveva mete taṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1111: sa hovāca / yastvānena rūpeṇānvicādvindādeva tvā sa iti sa yo hainametena
GV03sb_07_u:1112: rūpeṇānvicati vindati hainaṃ vittvā haivainaṃ cinute
GV03sb_07_u:1115: taddhyetasya rūpaṃ ya eṣa tapati yadi śuklaṃ na vindedapyaśuklaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1116: syādaśvastveva syādyadyaśvaṃ na vindedapyanaḍvāneva syādāgneyo vā
GV03sb_07_u:1121: na tathā kuryātpaśureṣa yadagniryo vai paśum purastātpratyañcamadhirohati
GV03sb_07_u:1122: viṣāṇābhyāṃ taṃ hantyatha yaḥ paścātprāñcam padbhyāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1123: tamātmanevainamārohedyaṃ vā ātmanā paśumārohanti sa pārayati sa na
GV03sb_07_u:1124: hinastyuttarato yaṃ hi kaṃ ca paśumārohantyuttarata
GV03sb_07_u:1126: ātmannagniṃ gṛhītvā satyaṃ sāma gāyati puṣkaraparṇamupadadhāti tasyātaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1130: rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā na hanyuriti tasmā etaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1135: eṣa vā asya pratyakṣaṃ divā goptā bhavati
GV03sb_07_u:1136: rātrisācayānyu vai rakṣāṃsi rātryā evāsmā etaṃ vajramabhigoptāraṃ karoti sarvataḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1137: pariṇayati sarvata evāsmā etaṃ vajramabhigoptāraṃ karoti triṣkṛtvaḥ pariṇayati
GV03sb_07_u:1138: trivṛtamevāsmā etaṃ vajramabhigoptāraṃ karotyathainamudañcam prāñcam prasṛjati
GV03sb_07_u:1139: tasyokto bandhuratha sa punarvipalyayate tasyopari bandhuḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1142: ātmano vā etamadhijanayati yādṛśādva jāyate tādṛṅṅeva
GV03sb_07_u:1148: sa gṛhṇāti / mayi gṛhṇāmyagre agnimiti tadātmannevāgre 'gniṃ gṛhṇāti rāyaspoṣāya
GV03sb_07_u:1149: suprajāstvāya suvīryāyeti tadu sarvā āśiṣa ātmangṛhṇīte māmu devatāḥ sacantāmiti
GV03sb_07_u:1151: tatsarvamātmangṛhṇīte sa vai tiṣṭhannātmannagniṃ gṛhītvānūpaviśya cinoti
GV03sb_07_u:1155: etadvai devā abruvantsatyamasya mukhaṃ karavāma te
GV03sb_07_u:1156: satyam bhaviṣyāmaḥ satyaṃ no 'nuvartsyati satyo naḥ sa kāmo bhaviṣyati yatkāmā
GV03sb_07_u:1165: yatsatyaṃ sāma purastādgāyati tadasya satyam mukhaṃ karoti
GV03sb_07_u:1166: sa satyam bhavati satyamenamanuvartate satyo 'sya sa kāmo bhavati yatkāma
GV03sb_07_u:1170: āpa eva tadāpo hi vai satyaṃ tasmādyenāpo yanti tatsatyasya
GV03sb_07_u:1178: āpo vai puṣkaraṃ tāsāmiyam parṇaṃ yathā ha
GV03sb_07_u:1181: tāmanantarhitāṃ satyādupadadhātīmāṃ tatsatye pratiṣṭhāpayati tasmādiyaṃ satye
GV03sb_07_u:1186: samudramabhitaḥ pinvamānamiti samudro homāmabhitaḥ pinvate vardhamāno
GV03sb_07_u:1187: mahāṃ ā ca puṣkara iti vardhamāno mahīyasva puṣkara ityetaddivo mātrayā
GV03sb_07_u:1188: varimṇā prathasvetyanuvimārṣṭyasau vā āditya eṣo 'gnirno haitamanyo divo varimā
GV03sb_07_u:1189: yantumarhati dyaurbhūtvainaṃ yacetyevaitadāha svarājopaddhāti svārājyaṃ hyapāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1193: asau vā āditya eṣa rukbha eṣa hīmāḥ sarvāḥ prajā
GV03sb_07_u:1194: atirocate roco ha vai taṃ rukbha ityācakṣate paro 'kṣam paro 'kṣakāmā hi devā
GV03sb_07_u:1197: etasya nirbādhā avastādu vā etasya raśmayaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1205: puṣkaraparṇamiyamu vai pratiṣṭhā yo vā asyāmapratiṣṭhito 'pi dūre
GV03sb_07_u:1206: sannapratiṣṭhita eva sa raśmibhirvā eṣo 'syām pratiṣṭhito
GV03sb_07_u:1211: prāviśattā abravīdbibhemi vai puram me kuruteti sa yo 'pāṃ rasa āsīttamūrdhvaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1213: pūṣkaraṃ ha vai tatpuṣkaramityācakṣate paro 'kṣam paro 'kṣakāmā hi
GV03sb_07_u:1219: purastājjāyate vi sīmataḥ suruco vena āvariti madhyaṃ vai sīmeme lokāḥ suruco
GV03sb_07_u:1221: vivṛṣvannudeti sa budhnyā upamā asya viṣṭhā iti diśo vā asya budhnyā upamā
GV03sb_07_u:1222: viṣṭhāstā hyeṣa upavitiṣṭhate sataśca yonimasataśca vivaritīme vai lokāḥ sataśca
GV03sb_07_u:1223: yonirasataśca yacca hyasti yacca na tadebhya eva lokebhyo jāyate triṣṭubhopadadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1224: traiṣṭabho hyeṣa sādayitvā sūdadohasādhivadati tasyokto bandhuḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1227: sa prajāpatiḥ so 'gniḥ sa yajamānaḥ sa hiraṇmayo bhavati
GV03sb_07_u:1228: jyotirvai hiraṇyaṃ jyotiragniramṛtaṃ hiraṇyamamṛtamagniḥ puruṣo bhavati puruṣo
GV03sb_07_u:1235: aramanta tadyadasyaitasyāṃ ramyāyāṃ tanvāṃ devā aramanta tasmāddhiramyaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1236: hiramyaṃ ha vai taddhiraṇyamityācakṣate paro 'kṣam paro 'kṣakāmā hi
GV03sb_07_u:1237: devāstathaivāsminnayametāṃ ramyāṃ tanūm madhyato dadhāti tasyāmasya devā
GV03sb_07_u:1238: ramante prāṇo vā asya sā ramyā tanūḥ prāṇamevāsminnetam madhyato dadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1241: asau vā āditya eṣa rukbho 'tha ya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale
GV03sb_07_u:1245: etadvai devā abruvanyadi vā imāvarvāñcā upadhāsyāmaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1246: sarvamevedam pradhakṣyato yadyu parāñcau parāñcāveva tapsyato yadyu
GV03sb_07_u:1248: 'rvāñcamanyamupādadhuḥ parāñcamanyaṃ sa eṣa raśmibhirarvāṅ tapati rukbhaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1249: prāṇaireṣa ūrdhvaḥ puruṣaḥ prāñcamupadadhāti prāṅ hyeṣo 'gniścīyate
GV03sb_07_u:1253: jātaḥ patireka āsīdityeṣa hyasya sarvasya bhūtasya jātaḥ patireka āsītsa dādhāra
GV03sb_07_u:1254: pṛthivīṃ dyāmutemāmityeṣa vai divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ ca dādhāra kasmai devāya haviṣa
GV03sb_07_u:1255: vidhemeti prajā patirvai kastasmai haviṣā vidhemetyetat
GV03sb_07_u:1258: asau vā ādityo drapsaḥ sa divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1259: ca skandatītyamūmitīmāmimaṃ ca yonimanu yaśca pūrva itīmaṃ ca lokamamuṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1260: cetyetadatho yaccedametarhi cīyate yaccādaḥ pūrvamacīyateti samānaṃ yonimanu
GV03sb_07_u:1261: saṃcarantamiti samānaṃ hyepa etaṃ yonimanu saṃcarati drapsaṃ juhomyanu sapta
GV03sb_07_u:1262: hotrā ityasau vā ādityo drapso diśaḥ sapta hotrā amuṃ tadādityaṃ dikṣu
GV03sb_07_u:1274: te 'bruvan / upa tajjānīta yathāsminpuruṣe vīryaṃ dadhāmeti te
GV03sb_07_u:1280: puruṣe gāyati puruṣe tadvīryaṃ dadhāti citre gāyati sarvāṇi hi
GV03sb_07_u:1284: ime vai lokāḥ sarpāste hānena sarveṇa sarpanti
GV03sb_07_u:1285: yadidaṃ kiṃ ca sarveṣāmu haiṣa devānāmātmā yadagniste devā
GV03sb_07_u:1286: etamātmānamupadhāyābibhayuryadvai na ime lokā anenātmanā na surpeyuriti
GV03sb_07_u:1292: etallokāntsthāpayatīmāṃlokānnamayati tatho hāsyaita etenātmanā na sarpanti
GV03sb_07_u:1295: ime vai lokāḥ sarpā yaddhi kiṃ ca sarpatyeṣveva
GV03sb_07_u:1296: tallokeṣu sarpati tadyatsarpanāmairupatiṣṭhate yaivaiṣu lokeṣu nāṣṭrā yo
GV03sb_07_u:1299: namo 'stu sarpebhyo ye ke ca pṛthivīmanu /
GV03sb_07_u:1300: ye antarikṣe ye divi tebhyaḥ sarpebhyo
GV03sb_07_u:1301: nama iti ya evaiṣu triṣu lokeṣu sarpāstebhya etannamaskaroti
GV03sb_07_u:1304: yātudhānapreṣitā haike daśanti ye vā vanaspatīmranu ye
GV03sb_07_u:1305: vāvaṭeṣu śerate tebhyaḥ sarpebhyo nama iti ye caiva vanaspatiṣu sarpā ye cāvaṭeṣu
GV03sb_07_u:1309: ye vā sūryasya raśmiṣu yeṣāmapsu sadaskṛtaṃ tebhyaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1310: sarpebhyo nama iti yatra yatraite tadevaibhya etannamaskaroti namo nama iti yajño
GV03sb_07_u:1311: vai namo yajñenaivainānetannamaskāreṇa namasyati tasmādu ha nāyajñiya
GV03sb_07_u:1312: brūyānnamasta iti yathā hainam brūyādyajñasta iti tādṛktat
GV03sb_07_u:1315: traya ime lokā atho trivṛdagniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā
GV03sb_07_u:1317: tiṣṭhannupatiṣṭhate tiṣṭhantīva vā ime lokā atho tiṣṭhanvai vīryavattaraḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1325: imamiha rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā na hanyuriti ta etānrākṣoghnānpratisarānapaśyankṛṇuṣva
GV03sb_07_u:1326: pājaḥ prasitiṃ na pṛthvīmiti rākṣoghnā vai pratisarāsta etaiḥ pratisaraiḥ sarvābhyo
GV03sb_07_u:1327: digbhyo rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā apahatyābhaye 'nāṣṭra etamātmānaṃ samaskurvata
GV03sb_07_u:1328: tathaivaitadyajamāna etaiḥ pratisaraiḥ sarvābhyo digbhyo rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā
GV03sb_07_u:1332: vajro vā ājyaṃ vajreṇaivaitaprakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā apahanti pañcagṛhītena
GV03sb_07_u:1336: triṣṭubvajreṇaivaitadrakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā apahanti sarvataḥ parisarpaṃ sarvābhya
GV03sb_07_u:1345: bāhū vai srucau bāhū evāsminnetatpratidadhāti te yatsrucau
GV03sb_07_u:1346: bhavataḥ srucau hi bāhū idameva kapucalamayaṃ daṇdo dve bhavato dvau hīmau
GV03sb_07_u:1347: bāhū pāśvata upadadhāti pārśvato hīmau bāhū
GV03sb_07_u:1351: dakṣiṇato rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā na hanyuriti ta etaṃ rakṣohaṇaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1352: vanaspatimapaśyankārṣmaryaṃ ta etena vanaspatinā dakṣiṇato rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā
GV03sb_07_u:1353: apahatyābhaye 'nāṣṭra etaṃ yajñamatanvata tathaivaitadyajamāna etena vanaspatinā
GV03sb_07_u:1354: dakṣiṇato rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā apahatyābhaye 'nāṣṭra etaṃ yajñaṃ tanuta ājyena pūrṇā
GV03sb_07_u:1355: bhavati vajro vā ājyaṃ vajreṇaivaitaddakṣiṇato rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā apahanti
GV03sb_07_u:1359: dadhāti dadhnā pūrṇā bhavati raso vai dadhi rasamevāsminnetaddadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1367: upa metam prati ma etaddhattaṃ yena me yuvamudakramiṣṭamiti
GV03sb_07_u:1368: tābhyāṃ vai nau sarvamannam prayaceti tau vai mā bāhū bhūtvā prapadyethāmiti
GV03sb_07_u:1369: tatheti tābhyāṃ vai sarvamannam prāyacattāvenam bāhū bhūtvā prāpadyetāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1370: tasmādbāhubhyāmevānnaṃ kriyate bāhubhyāmadyate bāhubhyāṃ hi sa sarvamannam
